Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to a mechanical problem on a train.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #56 Milwaukee bus or the #66 Chicago bus. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
